cookingTips: Mix barbecue sauce and raspberry jam together for a sweet-savory glaze with depth
Brush glaze on salmon midway through cooking to prevent burning from high heat
Cook skin-side down for crispy skin and juicy flesh; don't flip the fillets
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making a balanced sweet-savory glaze and baking salmon to perfect doneness with a crispy skin.
